Tommy.serif:
Wow, are you human? What's up?
 I'm the host of this house, Tommy. Be our guest!
Tommy.speaker: Tommy
Tommy.name: Tommy

Tommy.serif: Ask me anytime you worried here. Do you have questions?
Tommy.speaker: Tommy
Tommy.name: Tommy

next.option: Where is here? I wanna go home...

Tommy.serif: Ahh... You've just lost. OK, then here's the exit. Be careful on your way home!!
Tommy.speaker: Tommy

Tommy.serif:
Hahha! Anywhere you want. But as range as common sense.
You might die and go gameover if you do something irregular too much.
Tommy.speaker: Tommy
Tommy.name: Tommy

Tommy.serif:
Why not?
What do you wanna know about?
Tommy.speaker: Tommy
Tommy.name: Tommy

Ittan-momen.serif:
Hey! Watch out!!
 Here's many works which Tommy developed. They're not cheap!!
Ittan-momen.speaker: Ittan-momen
Ittan-momen.name: Ittan Momen

Ittan-momen.serif:
Any recomendations here? Hmm... Did you go to "About Me" page?
You can watch his works and get hypnotized!
Ittan-momen.speaker: Ittan-momen
Ittan-momen.name: Ittan Momen

Ittan-momen.serif: Do you wanna go to "About Me"?
Ittan-momen.speaker: Ittan-momen
Ittan-momen.name: Ittan Momen

Ittan-momen.serif:
OK, then grab my tail! Prepare to the gravity... 
Repeat after me!!
Ittan-momen.speaker: Ittan-momen
Ittan-momen.name: Ittan Momen

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Ola! Do you come here to play?
Yeah, only simple ones are avarable. Excuse me but I'm in training.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

next.option: I come to see the beauty.
It's OK. Show me your progress, Lady.

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Fooa! You know the spot huh?
I let you flatter me every second hahaha.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Do you like the beauty with long neck?
It's a bit handy to kiss at any height lol.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Hey Jessie! Are you cheating on me?
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Tommy
Jessie-Khan.name: Tommy

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Of course not!! Don't be jealous of my customer!!
 I can't keep my business!!!!!!!
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Huh, recently he always doubts me...
At least I want him to stop doubting even when I'm complimenting Henry Cavill...
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
OK, then let's play High and Low!
 I'll draw a card, then guess if the next card is higher or lower number.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Round 1... I drew "10" !
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Ohhhh, Sorry it was "7". Maybe next time.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Hoo! Bingo! It was "7". You have luck today.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Round 2... I drew "3" !
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Jesus, it was "2". That was so close, but you lost.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: It was "2"! Unbelievable... You're a bold gambler
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: It's Final Round!! So... as much as you can... choose whatever you’ll regret the least.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: I drew "8" !
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Nooo, It was "5"!
Never thought it continues three damn times, right? I'm sorry...
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
But I strongly recommend to try again, because we can speak the same serifs at current XD
 See you next time!
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif:
Oh my god, oh my god, OH MY GOD!!! It was "5"!
Congrats!! You won all at last!!!
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: You are truly blessed... Might it be better to get out here right now and go to lottery by today!?
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: By the way... I give it to you on your cheek for reward of this victory.
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: (mwah)
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan

Jessie-Khan.serif: Come back anytime! Keep it secret to my husband!!
Jessie-Khan.speaker: Jessie-Khan
Jessie-Khan.name: Jessie Khan
